schema.heading: JSON schema
schema.description: The JSON schema describing the structure of records to be extracted

texts.heading: Unstructured texts
texts.description: Unstructured texts from which structured data records are to be extracted following the JSON schema

extracted_records.heading: Extracted records
extracted_records.description: Records extracted from unstructrured texts using the JSON schema together with the [OpenAI Structured Outputs API](https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/structured-outputs/supported-schemas) to create schema-aligned data records
